Articles.Content:
The Overview                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Homeworld Planet Pack is a mod, centered around a dying white dwarf star. It takes place 62.7 trillion years after the event of Kerbal Space Program. This is my best mod so far, and I hope this will be seen as a good mod, as I intend it to be. This system is not very scientifically accurate from what I know, so take it with a pinch of salt.

THIS MOD IS NOT READY FOR REVIEW.
